page.title: 02Darlington Vicar's Week
page.content: Our school belongs to the parish of{St John and St Herbert, Darlington. The curate comes in to see us once a week. He has a weekly meeting with the vicar to discuss the week ahead. He takes services at 10 am on Sundays and Wednesdays. He says Sunday is a good day because he knows what he is doing. The curate takes 3 or 4 funerals a week. He will visit a sick person in hospital if he knows them but sometimes he telephones the hospital chaplain and asks him to make a visit. When a parishioner is very ill the curate puts some communion bread in a special box, takes it to the house, and holds a little service. The curates hobby is conjuring and he is a member of the{Magic Circle. { Samantha Cheesmond.
